meanings.definition: The beliefs and practices of a mystical and philosophical tradition attributed to Hermes Trismegistus.
meanings.sent1: Studying hermeticism helps one understand ancient mystical beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many scholars delve into hermeticism to explore its philosophical teachings.
meanings.sent3: The students found humor in trying to decipher the secrets of hermeticism.
meanings.sent4: Hermeticism is like a hidden treasure chest waiting to be unlocked.
meanings.sent5: The aura of hermeticism enveloped the room, filling it with mystery.

meanings.definition: A system of esoteric knowledge or teachings.
meanings.sent1: The library contained ancient texts on hermeticism, revealing hidden knowledge.
meanings.sent2: Modern practitioners seek to unravel the mysteries of hermeticism.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat teaching hermeticism to dogs seemed absurd.
meanings.sent4: Hermeticism is a labyrinth of wisdom waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The allure of hermeticism drew in seekers of arcane truths.
